Detailed Description

User class.

This class is used to create and manipulate users.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
Copyright:
2008 David Singer
Author:
David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
Version:
1.9.5

Boo_User::setStatus ( $  status  ) 

Set users status.

Possible values are:

  • BOO_STATUS_OK
  • BOO_STATUS_CLOSED
  • BOO_STATUS_SUSPENDED
  • BOO_STATUS_DISABLED
  • BOO_STATUS_PENDING
  • BOO_STATUS_UNKNOWN

You may use other integer values of your own. Statuses that indicate a user is in good standing (and allowed to login) should be greater than or equal to 1. Statuses that indicate a users account is closed, suspended, or otherwise inaccesable (and not allowed to login) be less than or equal to 0.

Parameters:
int $status User status.
Returns:
bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.

Definition at line 160 of file User.php.

Referenced by __construct().
